headline: AppLovin Legal Scrutiny Tests AI Adtech Expansion Beyond Gaming
summary: Short seller CapitalWatch accuses AppLovin (NasdaqGS:APP) of money laundering, which the company strongly denies. Law firm Pomerantz LLP is investigating potential securities fraud related to AppLovin. AppLovin has issued a cease and desist letter in response to the short seller allegations. The company has divested its gaming operations while expanding its AI powered adtech platform into e commerce, fintech, and automotive.
